content: Recently Wyngarde was discovered comatose in a lab that was being used for illicit mutant experimentation.  She has since recovered and been recruited by Rogue for her X-Men mutant rapid reaction force. Wyngarde recently betrayed the X-Men to the mutant villains known as the Marauders. She has since joined the team.
knownrelatives: Jason Wyngarde(Mastermind, father, deceased) & Martinique Jason (Mastermind, half-sister)
powers: Able to cast elaborate psionic illusions. Also has minor telepathic abilities
